caption.center: THE STATE OF WASHINGTON, Respondent, v. RAYMOND JOSEPH ADAMS,

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division One.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for Snohomish County, No. 01-1-00424-1, Gerald L. Knight, J., entered May 18, 2001.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed by unpublished per curiam opinion.
